text: @realDonaldTrump @marklevinshow @FoxNews Uh, no thanks. Hard pass. @realDonaldTrump  I don't have to watch anything to know you failed when #COVID19 first appeared and with nearly 90k dead and 40 million unemployed, you're still failing today. #presidentdeflection #TrumpHasNoPlan #DumpTrump2020
